clues.clue: In 1893 New Zealand became the first country to grant women this right in full

The poet who wrote, "Never send to know for whom the bell tolls; it tolls for thee"

1 of the 2 alternate names for garbanzos that fit the category

final_jeopardy.clue: Founded as a nail enamel co. in 1932, it has been called "the General Motors of beauty"
